Products & Solutions

Mission Bio provides diagnostic tools that enable the full power of precision medicine.

  • 01Designer

    With our Fixed and Custom panels you can accurately and efficiently study SNVs and indels across targeted gene panels or study those relevant to your disease research.

  • 02Pipeline

    Easily migrate your bioinformatics applications and pipelines, set-up projects, view results and collaborate in a highly-secured environment through on-demand access to compute infrastructure for immediate data processing.

  • 03Tapestri Insights

    A complete software solution for single-cell DNA analysis. From sequence import to data analysis and visualization, turnkey software ensures you gain meaningful insights.

Datasets

4 Tapestri runs with RAJI:K562 cell line mixes

  • These experiments demonstrate the ability to distinguish subclones at low population frequency.
  • K562 cell line was mixed with RAJI cell line as various ratio from 0.1%:99.1% to 50%:50%.
  • The 4 runs were performed on Tapistri and sequenced on Illumina MiSeq with ~2000 reads per cell
  • Reads were processed to generate variant calls using the standard Tapestri Pipeline.
  • Download includes
    • Loom file – viewed with Tapestri Insights
    • VCF – standard variant calling file
